title: About the First Strike Skins...
body:
I was wondering if I bought a summoner icon (Project Yi) since I already have Project Yi skin, would I be able to get the first strike skin? I've always been wondering about this, because if I buy a 1820 RP skin plus a 250 RP icon and I still don't get the border, isn't buying the skin kind of a rip off? Like there is nothing special I actually recently got the Project Yi skin just for the cool border and now I don't see it, it's not interesting to me, I also have Project Yasuo skin, but he also does not have the border.

And I also have the same question for Elementalist Lux, why do some people have the border and some don't. If people don't even get a simple border for paying 3000 RP, I really think RIOT is just ripping off the players. Because the border of Elementalist Lux does not look as good as the project ones. 

Thanks, I hope I can get the borders some how if not, I will probably leave it be, or hope RIOT does something about it.

replies.body:
Having both a project skin and their icon on an account won't unlock a special border.  The borders were initially intended for early purchases of the skin or during the special [disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) event.  I don't have any information on the borders making a return, but any info on that will be posted on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) site so bookmark it to stay up to day!

The Elementlist Lux border was provided for a limited time until December 13th, per the[ Elementalist Lux FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948-Elementalist-Lux-FAQ#h1q5).  

I hope that helps clear things up!
